traits.name: Alive
traits.desc: Being alive is generally a nice feeling.

parameters.name: Health
parameters.desc: The overall health of a creature. When this reaches zero, the creature dies. Affected by a number of conditions.

update parameter.name: Health Regen
update parameter.desc: The change of health for a creature over time. Changes once every 60 ticks. Influenced by a number of conditions, such as combat or injury.

max parameter.name: Max Health
max parameter.desc: How much a creature can handle before succumbing to death.

parameters.name: Energy
parameters.desc: How much energy a creature currently has to go about its daily activities

update parameter.name: Energy Regen
update parameter.desc: The change of energy for a creature over time. Changes once every 60 ticks. Influenced by a number of conditions, such as combat or injury. A severe lack of energy will lead to a decrease in health

max parameter.name: Max Energy
max parameter.desc: The maximum a creature can achieve without eating or sleeping

parameters.name: Age
parameters.desc: The older, the wiser

update parameter.name: Growth
update parameter.desc: This creature is slowly growing.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.desc: Have you seen the scale lately?

update parameter.name: Weight increase
update parameter.desc: As the creature grows, so does its weight.

traits.name: Undead
traits.desc: This creature is a member of the undead.

parameters.name: Sustenance
parameters.desc: To survive, the undead must look to the living.

update parameter.name: Sustenance decay
update parameter.desc: The undead swiftly decay without a source of sustenance.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.desc: Have you seen the scale lately?

update parameter.name: Weight increase
update parameter.desc: As the creature grows, so does its weight.

parameters.name: Age
parameters.desc: The older, the wiser

update parameter.name: Growth
update parameter.desc: This creature is slowly growing.

traits.name: Dead
traits.desc: This creature is dead.

parameters.name: Decay
parameters.desc: A rotting corpse slowly wastes away.

update parameter.name: Decay rate
update parameter.desc: Slowly wasting away.

parameters.name: Meat
parameters.desc: This creature can be eaten for food by carnivores or omnivores. Small chance of infection if eaten which increases over time.

update parameter.name: Meat decay rate
update parameter.desc: Slowly wasting away.

parameters.name: Undead influence
parameters.desc: The probability this creature will spawn again as an undead.

update parameter.name: Undead influence increase
update parameter.desc: Dark powers behold this corpse.

parameters.name: Infection probability
parameters.desc: The probability this creature will infect any creature which eats it.

update parameter.name: Infection probability increase
update parameter.desc: As the corpse rots, bacteria and other potentially contagious agents breed.

traits.name: Flight
traits.desc: This creature is capable of flight

parameters.name: Flying
parameters.desc: Whether the creature is currently in flight

parameters.name: Flying speed
parameters.desc: How fast the creature is able to fly. Influenced by both weight and current energy.

update parameter.name: Flying speed acceleration
update parameter.desc: Acceleration is the epitome of exhilaration.

traits.name: Gargantuan
traits.desc: The size of this creature is the stuff of legend.

traits.name: Very large
traits.desc: As a heavyweight, this creature requires significant energy and food to maintain itself. It also has a lower metabolism, and lower speed as a result.

traits.name: Large
traits.desc: As a heavyweight, this creature requires significant energy to maintain itself. It also has a lower metabolism, and lower speed as a result.

traits.name: Medium
traits.desc: This creature is about the size of a human.

traits.name: Small
traits.desc: This creature is light and is about the same size as a cat.

traits.name: Very small
traits.desc: This creature is very small and is about the same size as a mouse.

traits.name: Tiny
traits.desc: This creature is inconspicuous and about the same size as an ant.

traits.name: Infected
traits.desc: This creature has been infected with an illness.

parameters.name: Infection
parameters.desc: The spread of an infection within an organism. The higher, the more likely the creature is to become impaired or die.

update parameter.name: Infection spread
update parameter.desc: How quickly infection within the creature spreads.

traits.name: Weakly Infected
traits.desc: This creature has been infected with a mild illness.

parameters.name: Infection
parameters.desc: The spread of an infection within an organism. The higher, the more likely the creature is to become impaired or die.

update parameter.name: Weak infection spread
update parameter.desc: How quickly infection within the creature spreads.

traits.name: Contagious Infection
traits.desc: This creature has been infected with a highly contagious illness.

parameters.name: Infection
parameters.desc: The spread of an infection within an organism. The higher, the more likely the creature is to become impaired or die. Increases with infection amount.

update parameter.name: Infection spread
update parameter.desc: How quickly infection within the creature spreads.

traits.name: Strong Infection
traits.desc: This creature has been infected with a particularly dangerous infection.

parameters.name: Infection
parameters.desc: The spread of an infection within an organism. The higher, the more likely the creature is to become impaired or die.

update parameter.name: Infection spread
update parameter.desc: How quickly infection within the creature spreads.

traits.name: Deadly Infection
traits.desc: This creature has been infected with a normally terminal infection.

parameters.name: Infection
parameters.desc: The spread of an infection within an organism. The higher, the more likely the creature is to become impaired or die.

update parameter.name: Infection spread
update parameter.desc: How quickly infection within the creature spreads.

traits.name: Weak immune system
traits.desc: This creature has an impaired immune system

parameters.name: Immune system ability
parameters.desc: How well the creature is able to fight off infection.

traits.name: Immune system
traits.desc: This creature has a dedicated and functional immune system

parameters.name: Immune system ability
parameters.desc: How well the creature is able to fight off infection.

traits.name: Strong immune system
traits.desc: This creature has an unusually strong immune system able to combat most infections.

parameters.name: Immune system ability
parameters.desc: How well the creature is able to fight off infection.

traits.name: Landborne
traits.desc: This creature is able to move around places on land

parameters.name: Movement speed
parameters.desc: How quickly the creature can move

traits.name: Seaborne
traits.desc: This creature is able to swim in water

parameters.name: Water movement speed
parameters.desc: How quickly the creature can swim

traits.name: Aerobic
traits.desc: This creature relies upon oxygen to live.

parameters.name: Air supply
parameters.desc: How much access to oxygen the creature has. If this reaches 0 the creature dies.

update parameter.name: Air supply change
update parameter.desc: Decreases whenever the creature is drowning or suffocating

max parameter.name: Max air supply
max parameter.desc: The maximum amount of oxygen supply.

traits.name: Gills
traits.desc: This creature is able to breathe in water. Suitable for Large, Medium and Small creatures.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.desc: Have you seen the scale lately?

update parameter.name: Weight increase
update parameter.desc: As the creature grows, so does its weight.

traits.name: Lungs
traits.desc: This creature has lungs and through this is able to breathe in air.

parameters.name: Weight
parameters.desc: Have you seen the scale lately?

update parameter.name: Weight increase
update parameter.desc: As the creature grows, so does its weight.

traits.name: Hungry
traits.desc: A lack of food has resulted in this creature having reduced movement, combat ability and an increased susceptibility to infection.

traits.name: Starving
traits.desc: A severe lack of food has resulted in this creature having even more reduced movement, combat ability and an even more increased susceptibility to infection. Further lack of food will result in death.

traits.name: Thirsty
traits.desc: A lack of water has resulted in this creature having reduced movement, combat ability and an increased susceptibility to infection.

traits.name: Very thirsty
traits.desc: A severe lack of food has resulted in this creature having even more reduced movement, combat ability and an even more increased susceptibility to infection. Further lack of food will result in death.

traits.name: Tired
traits.desc: This creature is tired and wants to rest. Reduced movement, energy usage and combat ability.

traits.name: Requires food
traits.desc: This creature requires food to survive.

parameters.name: Hunger
parameters.desc: How much this creature requires food

update parameter.name: Hunger increase
update parameter.desc: Natural requirements for food necessitate this.

traits.name: Requires water
traits.desc: This creature requires water to survive.

parameters.name: Thirst
parameters.desc: How much this creature requires water

update parameter.name: Thirst increase
update parameter.desc: Natural requirements for water necessitate this.

traits.name: Omnivore
traits.desc: This creature is able to digest both animal and plant matter.

traits.name: Herbivore
traits.desc: This creature is able to digest only plant matter.

traits.name: Carnivore
traits.desc: This creature is able to digest only animal matter.

traits.name: Hive-minded
traits.desc: This creature operates under a hive system, where the queen replicates the species while workers maintain and defend the hive.

parameters.name: Queen
parameters.desc: Whether a creature is a queen

parameters.name: Hive split ratio
parameters.desc: The optimal ratio of workers to queens within the population

traits.name: Territorial
traits.desc: This creature operates under a system of territorial aggression, where a select few of its own are allowed into specific designated territory. Trespassing will cause retaliation.

parameters.name: Territorial range
parameters.desc: The range under which the creature asserts its territory.

traits.name: Caring
traits.desc: This creature cares after its young.

parameters.name: Age of care
parameters.desc: The age up to which the creature will care for its young.

traits.name: Burning
traits.desc: This creature is currently on fire. Contact with moisture will alleviate this, however they will still be significantly injured and prone to infection.

traits.name: Burn injury
traits.desc: This creature has a burn injury.

parameters.name: Immune system ability
parameters.desc: How well the creature is able to fight off infection.

max parameter.name: Max Health
max parameter.desc: How much a creature can handle before succumbing to death.
